verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H7130>within<s%> me, bless his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> not <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1576>benefits:<s%>
Who <S%H5545>forgives<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities;<s%> who <S%H7495>heals<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8463>diseases;<s%>
Who <S%H1350>redeems<s%> your <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H7845>destruction;<s%> who <S%H5849>crowns<s%> you with loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and tender <S%H7356>mercies;<s%>
Who <S%H7646>satisfies<s%> your <S%H5716>mouth<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> things; so that your <S%H5271>youth<s%> is <S%H2318>renewed<s%> like the <S%H5404>eagle's.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H6231>oppressed.<s%>
He made <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> his <S%H5949>acts<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7227>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>
He will not <S%H5331>always<s%> <S%H7378>chide:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will he <S%H5201>keep<s%> his anger for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
He has not <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with us after our <S%H2399>sins;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> us according to our <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
For as the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is <S%H1361>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> so <S%H1396>great<s%> is his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him.
As <S%H7350>far<s%> as the <S%H4217>east<s%> is from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> so <S%H7350>far<s%> has he <S%H7368>removed<s%> our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> from us.
Like as a <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7355>pities<s%> his <S%H1121>children,<s%> so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7355>pities<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him.
For he <S%H3045>knows<s%> our <S%H3336>frame;<s%> he <S%H2142>remembers<s%> that we are <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
As for <S%H582>man,<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are as <S%H2682>grass:<s%> as a <S%H6731>flower<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3652>so<s%> he <S%H6692>flourishes.<s%>
For the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> it, and it is <S%H369>gone;<s%> and the <S%H4725>place<s%> thereof shall <S%H5234>know<s%> it <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

But the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> on them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him, and his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children;<s%>
To such as <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and to those that <S%H2142>remember<s%> his <S%H6490>commandments<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3559>prepared<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> and his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> <S%H4910>rules<s%> over <S%H3605>all.<s%>

<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you his <S%H4397>angels,<s%> that <S%H1368>excel<s%> in <S%H3581>strength,<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H1697>commandments,<s%> <S%H8085>hearkening<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you his <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> you <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of his, that <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H7522>pleasure.<s%>

<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4639>works<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion:<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
